inclusion.criterion: diagnosed as having cirrhosis of liver
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patients diagnosed at Inpatient/Outpatient Liver Clinic of Department of Hepatology, PGIMER, Chandigarh
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: alcohol intake during the past 6 weeks
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of hypertension and hypercholesterolemia. He is an alert and cooperative man who does not have any signs of dementia.
